properties.description:
Load multiple csv files in data lake with different file names and delimiters

Link : 
https://www.mssqltips.com/sqlservertip/6281/how-to-load-multiple-files-in-parallel-in-azure-data-factory--part-1/
https://www.mssqltips.com/sqlservertip/6282/azure-data-factory-multiple-file-load-example--part-2/

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
     b.[ObjectName]
    ,FolderName = b.[ObjectValue]
    ,SQLTable   = s.[ObjectValue]
    ,Delimiter  = d.[ObjectValue]
FROM [dbo].[Metadata_ADF] b
JOIN [dbo].[Metadata_ADF] s ON b.[ObjectName] = s.[ObjectName]
JOIN [dbo].[Metadata_ADF] d ON b.[ObjectName] = d.[ObjectName]
WHERE   b.[SourceType] = 'BlobContainer'
    AND s.[SourceType] = 'SQLTable'
    AND d.[SourceType] = 'Delimiter';

properties.description:
Copy multiple tables using Filter

activities.name: Filter_Table_Startwith_P
activities.description: Filter tables which name starts with 'P'

activities.name: ForEach_CopyData
activities.description: Copy filtered table data from 0318 to 0319

properties.description:
Full or Incremental data load from 0318 (Source) to 0319 (Staging)

Link : https://www.udemy.com/course/implementing-real-world-use-cases-in-azure-data-factory-v2/learn/lecture/19940682#overview

activities.name: Load Enabled from 0319
activities.description: Read Enabled load table from CFG table in 0319 (Staging DB)

activities.name: If Full or Incremental
activities.description:
True (1) -> Incremental Load
False (0) -> Full Load

ifFalseActivities.name: Copy SRC0318 to STG0319 Full Load
Get Max Update date from Actual Table

dependsOn.activity: Copy SRC0318 to STG0319 Full Load
Get Max Update date from Actual Table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
update CFG set Max_LastUpdatedDate = '@{activity('Get Max Update date from Actual Table').output.firstRow.maxD}' where table_name like '@{item().Table_Name}'
select '1'

ifTrueActivities.name: Incr Load - Get Max LastUpdated CFG

sqlReaderQuery.value: select max_lastupdateddate from cfg where table_name = '@{item().Table_name}'

dependsOn.activity: Incr Load - Get Max LastUpdated CFG

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select  *
from @{item().Table_Name}
where convert(varchar(max), last_updated_date, 120) >
convert(varchar(max), substring(replace('@{activity('Incr Load - Get Max LastUpdated CFG').output.firstrow.max_lastupdateddate}', 'T', ' '), 0, 20), 120)

ifTrueActivities.name: Get Max Update date from Actual Tables

dependsOn.activity: Get Max Update date from Actual Tables

sqlReaderQuery.value:
update cfg set max_lastupdateddate = '@{activity('Get Max Update date from Actual Tables').output.firstrow.maxD}' where table_name = '@item().Table_Name'
select '1'

activities.name: CheckDate_AC
activities.description: This expression will check whether or not the Last modified field obtained from the previous activity falls within last 1 day period

properties.description:
Send Notifications from an Azure Data Factory Pipeline using Logic App

Test with 006_PL_DATA_StoredProcedure

Link : https://www.mssqltips.com/sqlservertip/5718/azure-data-factory-pipeline-email-notification--part-1/

https://www.mssqltips.com/sqlservertip/5962/send-notifications-from-an-azure-data-factory-pipeline--part-2/

body.value:
{
   "DataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
   "PipelineName": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
   "Subject": "An error has occurred!",
   "ErrorMessage": "The ADF pipeline has crashed! Please check the logs.",
   "EmailTo": "zoomok@gmail.com"
}

activities.name: Copy table list into Pipeline table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select	quotename(table_schema) + '.' +
		quotename(table_name) as Table_Name,
		Table_catalog
from	information_schema.tables
where   table_type = 'BASE TABLE'

dependsOn.activity: Copy table list into Pipeline table

activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from my Azure database

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT' and TABLE_NAME in ('Customer','Address')

properties.description: Dataset for general purpose and 0318 tables
Dataset for general purpose and 0319 tables

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesRepSTG
source(output(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimSalesRepSCD1
SalesRepSTG, DimSalesRepSCD1 exists(SalesRepSTG@SalesRep_Number == DimSalesRepSCD1@SalesRep_Number,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IfExistsThenUpdate
SalesRepSTG, DimSalesRepSCD1 exists(SalesRepSTG@SalesRep_Number == DimSalesRepSCD1@SalesRep_Number,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IfNotExistsThenInsert
IfExistsThenUpdate alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
IfNotExistsThenInsert sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Insert
AlterRow sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SalesRep_Number'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Department
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Update
